SUMMARY: Shares of Hugo Boss plunged 13% Thursday, after the company warned that it may fail to meet its 2025 sales target.

TITLE: Foot Locker shares plunge nearly 30% as retailer posts holiday loss, delays key financial target
SUMMARY: Foot Locker reported earnings as CEO Mary Dillon leads the legacy retailer through an ambitious turnaround. But some analysts say it has gone too slowly.
